typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as string,
		Value as string,
		Currency as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document') ~> PaymentDataCosmosDB
PaymentDataCosmosDB derive(PaymentDateD = toDate('2021-01-01' , 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		ValueD = toDecimal('12.51', 15, 2)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as date,
		PaymentValue as decimal(15,2),
		Currency as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PaymentDateSynapse
